column3: She did not hand over possession of the property to the 10th Respondent;
She continues to be in possession of the land;
There is a cinnamon plantation and coconut trees on the land;
She has employed Karunapala to look after the property;
The income thereof is taken by her;
She  visits  the  said  land  every  two  months  or  so  while  her  husband  visits  the
She was present when the valuer visited the property.
